title: Improved adding new alert screen, now exits when added and checkboxes value is…
message: Improved adding new alert screen, now exits when added and checkboxes value is checked, some not active though. Started work on assmebling messages on the fly from database for newsfeed so can alter message format without having to wipe DB. Will mean lot more sqlite queries when assembling politics feed though.
